00068 #define MSG_CALL            1
00069 #define MSG_RESULT          2
00070 #define MSG_MESSAGE         3
00071 #define MSG_END             4
00072 #define MSG_QUIT            5
00073 #define MSG_ACK             6
00074 #define MSG_NOACK           7

00079 #define TY_BULK         4
00080 
00081 #define SZ_MSGBUF           102400
00082 #define SZ_METHOD           64
00083 #define SZ_CLASS            64
00084 #define SZ_MSGSTR           65535
00085 #define SZ_PBUF             128
00086 #define SZ_FNAME            256
00087 #define SZ_URL              2048
00088 #define MAX_VALUES          64
00089

00091 #define CONE_CONN       2   /* Simple Cone Search       */
00092 #define SIAP_CONN       3   /* Simple Image Access      */
00093 #define SSAP_CONN       4   /* Simple Spectral Access   */
00094 #define SLAP_CONN       5   /* Simple Line Access       */
00095 #define STAP_CONN       6   /* Synch TAP Access     */

00115 typedef int   ObjectID;         /* DAL type aliases     */
00116 typedef int   DAL;
00117 typedef int   Query;
00118 typedef int   QResponse;
00119 typedef int   QRecord;
00120 typedef int   QRAttribute;

00129 #ifdef _VOCLIENT_LIB_
00130 
00131 typedef struct vocMsg {
00132     int         type;                   /* message type                 */
00133 
00134     ObjectID    objId;                  /* for CALL messages            */
00135     char        method[SZ_METHOD];
00136     int         nparams;                
00137 
00138     int         status;                 /* for RESULT messages          */
00139     int         restype;                
00140     int         nitems;         
00141 
00142     char        msgclass[SZ_CLASS];     /* for MESSAGE messages         */
00143     char        msgstr[SZ_MSGSTR];
00144 
00145     char        message[SZ_MSGBUF];     /* fully formed message         */
00146 } vocMsg_t;
00147 
00148 
00149 
00150 typedef struct vocRes {
00151     int         status;                 /* result status                */
00152     int         type;                   /* type of result value         */
00153     int         nitems;                 /* no. of returned items        */      
00154     char        value[MAX_VALUES][SZ_MSGSTR];   /* value strings        */
00155 
00156     void    *buf;           /* bulk data buffer     */
00157     int     buflen;         /* length of buffer     */
00158 } vocRes_t;
00159 
00160 
00161 typedef struct VOClient {
00162     char   *server_host;                /* socket to DALServer          */
00163     char   *runid;                      /* RUNID logging string         */
00164     int     server_port;
00165     int     io_chan;
00166 
00167     int     msg_port;                   /* asynch message socket        */
00168     int     msg_chan;
00169 
00170     int     onetrip;            /* private invocation flag  */
00171     int     debug;          /* debug flag           */
00172     int     quiet;          /* suppress output?     */
00173     int     use_cache;          /* use cached results?      */
00174     int     use_runid;          /* use RUNID parameter?     */
00175     int     use_mini_d;         /* use mini-daemon      */
00176     int     handle_context;     /* mini-daemon handle context   */
00177 
00178 } VOClient, *VOClientPtr;
00179
